mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marketorder (order_idx, email, name, phone, addr1, addr2, message, payment_method, payment, point, zipcode) VALUES (seq_marketorder_idx.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{message}, #{payment_method}, ${payment}, ${point}, #{zipcode})
mapper.delete: UPDATE cart SET payed='true', order_idx=#{order_idx} WHERE email=#{email} AND payed='false'
